message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you this excellent product at a competitive price of $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $9,500 for the product. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $12,000 is already a competitive price.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering my budget and the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $10,500. This still leaves room for negotiation while respecting both our positions.
